question: Who of the following is selected for the National Design Award?
explanation: Recently, Indian government announced that Scientific Advisor to the Defence Minister G Satheesh Reddy will be awarded the National Design Award. He will receive the National Design Award during the Indian Engineering Congress held on 21st December 2017 at Chennai. Satheesh Reddy heads Dr APJ Abdul Kalam Missile Complex.He has also played an important role in formulation of national policies, guiding research and innovation in industry, academia and R&D institutes.
